title: Historic Loft with Modern Flair in Vibrant Orunia, Gdansk
description: Discover this beautifully restored loft blending brick-and-beam charm with state-of-the-art comforts. Located in an intimate, revitalized warehouse, it offers 2 airy bedrooms, 2 sleek bathrooms, and an expansive open-plan living space flooded with natural light. Tall ceilings, exposed brick walls, and an integrated smart home system make it ideal for modern living. A designated home office area streamlines remote work and creative pursuits.
neighborhood_description: Set in the flourishing Orunia neighborhood, this home sits at the crossroads of historic character and contemporary development. Ride efficient public transit or access fast highways to explore both Gdansk’s energetic business district and lush parks. Join an eco-conscious community drawn to vibrant green spaces, cycling paths, and abundant local cafés.

access to eco-trails and local parks

target_buyer: Ideal for digital nomads, entrepreneurs, or couples seeking a fusion of historic charm and seamless deadlines from home.
